Lilia has a massage therapy business in the Philippines. Lilia requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase towels, bed sheets, hot oil and body lotion.

Lilia has been in this business for fourteen years. In the future, Lilia would like to save money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase towels, bed sheets, hot oil and body lotion.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is a 38 year old married woman with five children, 4 of them are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Julieta has a computer gaming business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to pay for the internet bills, electricity and purchase additional units for her business.

Julieta has been in this business for 2 years and would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to pay for internet bills, electricity and purchase additional units for her business

loans.name: Luisa María

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Luisa, tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, una de sus hijos  aún vive con ella junto con su esposo y dos nietos. Su esposo es albañil.
Doña Luisa al ver que en ocasiones su marido no tiene trabajo hace más de cinco años empezó un pequeño negocio en su casa, ella vende helados jugos y bebidas de toda clase, su casa está muy cerca de una cancha lugar donde todos los días llegan muchas personas a hacer deporte por lo cual sus ventas son muy buenas.  Gracias a esto en ciertas ocasiones que su marido está sin trabajo es como salen adelante. 
Este crédito es para surtir aún más su negocio, va a comprar jugos, helados, colas, etc. Esta casi desde el inicio en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios y ayuda que le brinda la institución. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y gozar de buena salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Por Un Nuevo Amanecer” (For a New Dawn) meets every fifteen days in Montecristi Canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, which are recognized at a national and international level. It is the home of the famous Panama hats. 

In this place lives Luisa. She is 67 years old and is married. From this relationship, she has three children who are grown. One of her children still lives with her, along with her spouse and two grandchildren. Luisa’s husband is a mason. 

After seeing that sometimes, her husband doesn’t have work, more than five years ago Luisa opened a small business in her house. She sells ice cream, juice and all kinds of drinks. Her house is very close to a field where every day, many people come to play sports; because of this, her sales are excellent. Thanks to this, at certain times when her husband is out of work, she is able to continue forward. 

This loan is for stocking her business even more. She is going to buy juice, ice cream, cola, etc. She has been in the communal bank almost from the beginning, and she likes it for the benefits and help that the organization offers to her. Her dreams are to get ahead and to enjoy good health.

loans.use: to purchase juice, ice cream, cola, etc.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 29 years old and is married to Hellen. They have been blessed with two children. He has a metal workshop in Tala town where he makes metal door frames as well as window frames. He has been in the business for 5 years. Besides the metal workshop business, he also sells timber.  

He will be using the loan to purchase a power saw. This will enable him make more timber and wood chips to sell as firewood.

This is his 6th loan term and he paid all his previous loans successfully. His hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: To buy a power saw for his business.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is 52 years old and married with six children. To make a living, Erlinda owns and operates a specialized general store and  has been  in her business for six years .In 2007, Erlinda joined GDMPC and her previous that was used to purchased goods was successfully repaid. She is requesting a new loan to purchase new items such as rice and feed to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as rice and feed to sell

loans.name: Bunusa

texts.ru: Бунусе 60 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Бунусы - высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бунуса занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бунусы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, а также имеет земельный надел размером 0,74 ГА, на которой она ежегодно выращивает: кукурузу, пшеницу. Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бунуса обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для откорма и дальнейшей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Бунуса планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт сарая.
texts.en: Bunusa is 60 years old, married and raising two children together with her husband. Bunusa has a higher education. To provide the primary income for her family, Bunusa is involved in animal husbandry, having started 10 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Bunusa's hard work, today her business contains 2 dairy cows and also a 0.74 hectare land plot, where she annually grows corn and wheat. The monthly income amounts to 17,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Bunusa requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy cows for fattening up and subsequent resale. Bunusa plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to repair a barn.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening up and subsequent resale

loans.name: Shohidakhon

texts.ru: Шохидахон молодая и не счастливая женщина. Она вышла замуж в марте этого года и развелась с мужем в июне. Она живет с родителями и братьями. Шохидахон с 2011 года училась у портнихи шитью женской одежды и данное время она умело и красиво шьёт женские платья. Шохидахон благодаря хорошему сервису имеет своих клиентов. Она имеет доброе сердце. Ее тётя попросила помочь ей. Ее тётя не имеет постоянное место работы в Таджикистане и поэтому хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию. Шохидахон запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки авиабилета. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shohidakhon is a young and unlucky woman.  She got married in March of this year and got divorced from her husband in June.  She lives with her parents and brothers.  Shohidakhon has been learning to sew women's clothing from a seamstress since 2011 and currently sews women's dresses skillfully and beautifully.  Shohidakhon has her own customers thanks to her good service.  She has a kind heart.  Her aunt asked Shohidakhon to help her.  Her aunt does not have a permanent place of employment in Tajikistan and this is why wants to go to the Russian Federation.  Shohidakhon is requesting a loan in the amount of 2000 somoni to purchase an airline ticket for her.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy an airline ticket for her aunt to go to Russia

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.ru: Тахмина современная женщина, которая родилась в 1981 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 не совершеннолетних детей. Тахмина с детства училась у портнихи шитью женской одежды. Тахмина уже опытная портниха. Она более 7 лет занимается предоставлением услуги швеи. Она предоставляет свои услуги дома. Тахмина старается создать хорошею условию проживания для своих детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Он отправляет деньги, но его деньги едва хватает для покупки продуктов питания. Тахмина хочет, чтобы ее дети имели компьютер и жили в доме, где имеет мягкую мебель. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки компьютера и мебели. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Tahmina is a modern woman, who was born in 1981. She is married and is raising three children. As a child Tahmina was taught by a dressmaker how to make women's clothes. Tahmina is now an experienced dressmaker. She has been working as a seamstress for over 7 years. She works from home and tries to create good living conditions for her children. 

Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation. He sends money home but that money hardly covers the cost of food for the family. Tahmina wants her children to have a computer and to live in a house where they have cushioned furniture. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy a computer and furniture. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a computer and furniture for her children

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en: Josefina is a beautician and manicurist within her locality. She is widowed and blessed with seven children. According to her, she was only 18 years old when she started working as manicurist. Josefina aspires to maintain her beauty salon business. That's the reason she is asking for another loan amounting to PHP 12,000. She will use this amount to buy chemicals for hair cold waves and for various kinds of nail polish (cutex) which will be used for her beauty salon business. Josefina is looking forward to continuous growth of her beauty salon business. In this way, she could sustain her family's needs and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals for hair cold waves and for various kinds of nail polish (cutex) for her beauty salon business

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 49 years old, married and supports seven people in her family. She and her spouse have been blessed with five children. She does dairy farming and she has been in the business for 17 years. 

She will be using the loan to buy farm inputs like fertilizer and animal feed for her dairy cattle. She will use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to repay the loan as well as educate her children.

This is her second loan term and in the future, she hopes to expand her dairy farming by having more dairy cows and also be a successful social  business lady.

loans.use: To buy feed for her dairy cattle and fertilizer.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is a well-experienced tailor providing a tailoring service business in a rental place in town. She lives in Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia with her husband and three children in her small house. Her husband Hairat is a driver and currently unemployed. Her three children are local high and primary school students respectively.

Riza learned tailoring when she was 25 and tailored her family's clothes and worked in a local construction company as an assistant worker. She attended the public tailoring and small business management training in 2010 and was granted a tailoring machine. She started her tailoring service business in a rental place then. She is now requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to purchase inventory and some winter preparation goods for her business and her family. She is a hardworking, responsible and reticent woman.

loans.use: to purchase inventory and some winter preparation goods

loans.name: Innocente

texts.fr: Innocente est une jeune dame de 32ans. Elle a épousé un soudeur et ils ont 04enfants dont 03 scolarisés. Au bord de la route, elle revend des biscuits, des produits de beauté et autres à toutes personnes dans le besoin. Avec son troisième crédit qu’elle sollicite à WAGES, elle va s’approvisionner en marchandises pour pouvoir répondre aux besoins de ses clients.  Elle veut rendre son activité pérenne et avoir une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: Innocente is a 32-year-old woman. She is married to a welder, and they have four children, three of which are in school. On the roadside, she sells cookies and beauty products to anyone in need of them. With the third loan she is requesting from WAGES, she is going to stock up on merchandise in order to better meet her customers' needs. She wants to make her business sustainable and to have good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy biscuits and cosmetic products for resale

loans.name: Ayda Aracely

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Aracely, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, pero aún viven en su casa. Su esposo es maestro.
Doña Aracely  tiene un local en el museo de la ciudad por el cual paga un arriendo, allí ella vende todo tipo de artesanía elaboradas en paja toquilla, cerámica, madera y varios materiales más, ella al igual que varias compañeras del lugar muchas veces realizan ferias ya sea en la misma ciudad o en otros cantones exponiendo sus productos y es así cuando mas venden, lo que más vende son los sombreros de paja toquilla ya estos son muy apreciados más que todo por los extranjeros que llegan hasta el lugar, lleva dos años con su local, ella compra las artesanías en la zona y también le traen de la sierra.
Este crédito es para surtir aún más su negocio, va a comprar toda clase de artesanías. Este es su tercer ciclo en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son a muy bajos intereses. Sus sueños son tener su local propio.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Por un Nuevo Amanecer" meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and crafts, on both a national and international level.  It is also kown for its famous straw hats.

Aracely, 54, lives here and is married and has three adult children who still live at home.  Her husband is a teacher.

Aracely rents a shop in the city museum where she sells all kinds of crafts made of straw, ceramic, wood and other materials.  She and her colleagues organize several fairs either in their own city or in other cantons so they can display and sell their products.  Straw hats are the most widely sold items since they are very popular among foreigners who visit the area.  She has been running her shop for two years.  She buys crafts in the area and also through people who bring them from the sierra mountain range.

This loan is to restock her business as she plans to buy all kinds of crafts.  This is her third loan in the communal bank and she likes the fact that the loans have very low interest rates.  Her dream is to have her own shop one day.

loans.use: To buy crafts.

loans.name: Carmen Valentina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Carmen, tiene 31 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, de 13 y 6 años de edad, el mayor estudia en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Carmen es una muy buena madre y esposa que además de esto se dedica al comercio, vende zapatos por catálogos y productos de Avon, Lebel, Yanbal (perfumes, cremas, bisutería entre otras cosas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta para lo cual que sale tres días por semana enseñando su revista y realizando sus pedidos mismos que luego entrega a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, ella lleva 6 años en este negocio y  le va muy bien.
Este crédito es para comprar cremas, perfumes, bisutería y zapatos. Lleva 3 años   en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y sin tantos requisitos. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Por un Nuevo Amanecer" meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its crafts, known on both a national and international level.  The place is also known for its famous straw hat.

This is where Carmen, 31, lives with her common-law husband and two children, ages 13 and 6.  The eldest is in middle school and the youngest is in grade school.  Her husband is a merchant.

Carmen is a good wife and mother, and works as a merchant selling shoes by catalogue and Avon, Lebel and Yanbal products (perfumes, creams, costume jewelry, etc.)  She sells door to door, showing her catalgoue, three days a week and delivers the goods on credit, collecting payment every eight days.  She has been in business for six years and it is going very well.

This loan is to buy creams, perfumes, costume jewelry and shoes.  She has been a member of the communal bank for three years and she likes the fact that the loans are quick and have few requirements.  Her dream is to give her children the best she can.

loans.use: To buy creams, perfumes, costume jewelry and shoes.

loans.name: Cecilia Marisol

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Cecilia, tiene 36 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene 4  hijos, de 17, 15, 12 y 9 años, los 3 mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela, su marido es comerciante.
Doña Cecilia es una muy buena madre y esposa que para que a sus hijos no les falte nada  se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y productos de Belcorp (perfumes, cremas, bisutería entre otras cosas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta para lo cual sale tres o cuatro días por semana ofreciendo sus productos, en ciertas ocasiones sus hijos le acompañan a vender cuando están desocupados, ella lleva 8 años en este negocio con el cual ayuda a sus hijos con los gastos que generan sus estudios lo cual es muy importante para ella.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, cremas, perfumes y bisutería. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda para ella. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Por un Nuevo Amanecer" meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its crafts, known on both a national and international level. The place is also known for its famous straw hat.

This is where Cecilia, 36, lives with her common-law husband and their four children, ages 17, 15, 12 and 9.  The three eldest are in middle and high school and the youngest goes to elementary school.  Her husband is a merchant.

Cecilia is a good wife and mother who works as a merchant to support her children.  She sells all kinds of clothing and Belcorp products (perfumes, creams, costume jewelry, etc.).  She sells door to door and goes out three or four days a week offering her products.  Sometimes her children go with her if they are not busy.   For eight years she has been in business and helping her children cover their education costs, which is very important to her.

This loan is to buy clothing, creams, perfumes and costume jewelry.  She has been a member of the communal bank since the beginning and she likes the loans because they are of much help to her.  Her dream is to give her children the best she can.

loans.use: To buy clothing, creams, perfumes and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Genito Ramón

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive Don Genito, tiene 39 años de edad, está soltero y vive en  casa de los padres, lleva 5 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos el financia su negocio.
El Señor Genito es un hombre muy trabajador que le gusta ganar lo suyo honradamente, el se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, también se desplaza hasta los campos lugares donde tiene muchos clientes que siempre le compran, allí deja su mercadería a crédito la misma que cobra cada ocho días,  lleva más de 5 años en este negocio el cual le permite ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas y otras prendas que vende. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y tener un carro para ir a realizar sus ventas.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Por un Nuevo Amanecer" meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its crafts, known on both a national and international level. The place is also known for its famous straw hat.

This is where Genito, 39 and single, lives with his parents.  He has been a member of the communal bank for five years and likes the fact that he can finance his business thanks to the loans.

Genito is a hard-working man who likes to earn an honest living.  He sells all kinds of clothing on a door-to-door basis.  He also goes out in the country where there are customers who always buy from him.  He leaves the merchandise on credit and collects payment every eight days.  For over five years he has been in this business which has allowed him to help his parents cover household expenses.

He will use the loan to buy pants, blouses and other clothing articles.  His dream is to prosper and buy a car one day for his sales activity.

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses and other clothing.
